format("truetype");font-weight:700;font-style:italic;font-variant:normal}*,*::before,*::after{box-sizing:inherit}html{box-sizing:border-box}html,body{margin:0;padding:0}html{font-family:"Libertad", sans-serif;font-size:100%;line-height:1.5;color:#001d2e}@media screen and (min-width: 100ch){html{font-size:1.125em}}body{padding-top:3rem}.button{position:relative;border:1px solid currentColor;border-radius:.25rem;background-color:transparent;font-weight:normal;font-size:1rem;line-height:1;padding:.5rem 1rem calc(.5rem + 1/4 * 1em);vertical-align:baseline;transition:color 0.25s cubic-bezier(0, 1, 1, 1),background-color 0.25s cubic-bezier(0, 1, 1, 1),border 0.25s cubic-bezier(0, 1, 1, 1)}.button::after{content:"";display:block;position:absolute;top:-.5em;left:-.5em;border-radius:.25rem;width:calc(100% + 1em);height:calc(100% + 1em);border:.125em solid #ff0040;opacity:0;transition:top 0.25s cubic-bezier(0, 1, 1, 1),left 0.25s cubic-bezier(0, 1, 1, 1),width 0.25s cubic-bezier(0, 1, 1, 1),height 0.25s cubic-bezier(0, 1, 1, 1),opacity 0.25s cubic-bezier(0, 1, 1, 1);pointer-events:none}a.button{text-decoration:none;color:inherit;display:inline-block}.button:focus{outline:none}.button:hover,.button:focus{color:#ff0040;background-color:transparent}.button:hover::after,.button:focus::after{top:-.0625em;left:-.0625em;width:calc(100% + .125em);height:calc(100% + .125em);opacity:1}.button:active{color:#e6003a;background-color:rgba(255,0,64,0.05)}:link{display:inline-block;text-decoration:none;color:#005a8e}:visited{color:#4d2363}.site-header{display:flex;flex-flow:row nowrap;align-items:baseline;justify-content:space-between;position:fixed;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:3rem;background-color:#001d2e;color:#fff;padding-left:4rem;padding-right:4rem;white-space:nowrap;z-index:10}@media screen and (min-width: 100ch){.site-header{padding-right:calc(1/7 * 100%);padding-left:calc(1/7 * 100%)}}.site-header__site-title{font-size:1.2em;line-height:1rem;padding-right:4rem}.site-header__site-title a,a.site-header__site-title{color:inherit;text-decoration:none;padding-top:.5rem;padding-bottom:.5rem}.site-header__nav{color:#ffd894;text-transform:uppercase;line-height:1rem;height:100%}.site-header__nav ul{list-style:none;padding:0;margin:0;display:flex;flex-flow:row nowrap;align-items:center;height:100%}.site-header__nav ul li{padding:0;margin:0}.site-header__nav li:not(:last-child){margin-right:2rem}.site-header__nav a{color:inherit;text-decoration:none;padding-top:.5rem;padding-bottom:.5rem}.site-footer{padding:2rem 4rem}@media screen and (min-width: 100ch){.site-footer{padding:2rem calc(1/7 * 100%)}}.project-masthead{background-color:#f2f6f9;padding-top:2rem;padding-bottom:2rem;padding-left:4rem;padding-right:4rem;border-top:1px solid transparent}@media screen and (min-width: 100ch){.project-masthead{padding-left:calc(1/7 * 100%);padding-right:calc(1/7 * 100%)}}.project-masthead h1{font-size:3em;line-height:1;margin-top:4rem;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:1rem;margin-left:0}.project-masthead h2{font-size:1.5em;font-weight:200;letter-spacing:.5ch;text-transform:uppercase;color:#a4c4d7;margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:6rem;margin-left:0}.project>h1,.project>h2,.project>h3,.project>h4,.project>h5,.project>h6,.project>p,.project>blockquote,.project>ul,.project>ol,.project>dl{padding-left:4rem;padding-right:4rem}@media screen and (min-width: 100ch){.project>h1,.project>h2,.project>h3,.project>h4,.project>h5,.project>h6,.project>p,.project>blockquote,.project>ul,.project>ol,.project>dl{padding-left:0;padding-right:0;margin-right:calc(1/7 * 100%);margin-left:calc(1/7 * 100%)}}.project>h1,.project>h2,.project>h3,.project>h4,.project>h5,.project>h6{clear:both}.project h1{color:inherit}.project h2{color:#008f7b;margin-bottom:1em}.project h3{text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:.33333ch}.project-aside{padding:1rem 4rem;background-color:#f2f6f9;color:inherit;width:100%;margin-top:1rem;margin-bottom:1rem}@media screen and (min-width: 100ch){.project-aside{width:calc(2/7 * 100%);float:right;padding:1rem;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:1rem;margin-right:calc(1/7 * 100%)}}.project-aside h1,.project-aside h2,.project-aside h3,.project-aside h4,.project-aside h5,.project-aside h6{margin-top:0}.project-feature{background-color:#f2f6f9;padding:1rem 0;margin-top:2rem}.project-feature::after{content:"";display:table;width:0;height:0;clear:both}.project-feature+.project-feature{margin-top:0}.project-feature__figure--right,.project-feature__figure--left{width:100%;height:auto;min-width:20ch}@media screen and (min-width: 100ch){.project-feature__figure--right,.project-feature__figure--left{width:calc(4/7 * 100%)}}.project-feature__figure--right img,.project-feature__figure--left img{width:100%;height:auto;box-shadow:0 1rem 2rem rgba(0,0,0,0.25)}.project-feature__figure--right{float:right;margin:2rem}.project-feature__figure--left{float:left;margin:2rem}.project-feature__content--left,.project-feature__content--right{width:100%;position:sticky;top:4rem}@media screen and (min-width: 100ch){.project-feature__content--left,.project-feature__content--right{width:calc(2/7 * 100%)}}@media screen and (min-width: 100ch){.project-feature__content--left{margin-left:calc(1/7 * 100%)}}@media screen and (min-width: 100ch){.project-feature__content--right{margin-right:calc(1/7 * 100%)}}.project-figure,.project-figure--full-width{width:100%;margin:0;padding:0}.project-figure img,.project-figure--full-width img{display:block;width:100%;height:auto}.project-figure figcaption,.project-figure--full-width figcaption{color:#808e97;font-size:.875em;text-align:center;padding:0;margin:1rem}.project-cta{background-color:#f2f6f9;text-align:center;padding:2rem}.project-cta__heading{color:#ff0040;margin:0 0 1rem}
